title: FAQ
subtitle: Things I get asked a lot

questions.label: What services do I offer?
questions.content: I primarily offer DevOps and Cloud consulting services. My goal is to help you build an infrastructure that meets your needs and those of your users.

questions.label: Can you help me learn how to make a infra?
questions.content: I'm currently creating courses to make available and creating videos on YouTube, but I can recommend resources and tips to better guide your learning.

questions.label: How much does a project cost?
questions.content: The cost of a project depends on many factors, such as the size of the project, the features, the development time, etc.

questions.label: What do you like most about this job?
questions.content: I love learning new things and being able to create practically everything from scratch, creating automated things that people will use and appreciate.

questions.label: Do you have any passions outside of work?
questions.content: I love what I do, so I usually spend a lot of time working on personal projects, playing a video game, etc.
